titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Zambia
Zambia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Records remain closed for 20 years after their creation.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives of Zambia, Government Road, Ridgeway, P. O. BOX 500 10, Lusaka.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs, PO Box 50069, Lusaka (Telephone: 262-666; Fax: 250-634/240, 252-867)

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers must provide a letter of recommendation from a sponsoring university or institution. It is advisable to write the Archives ahead of time to find out about its holdings.
